about_the_game:
Additional character pack Vol.2 "Chika & Ruby & You" includes the following:

1. Added playable character "Chika, Ruby, You"
2. New story "Chika, Ruby, You"
3. New initial charm "Nightwicked Chika, Nightwicked Ruby, Nightwicked You"
4. New summoning card "Heavenly Fortune"


I will introduce each content.

1. Added playable character "Chika, Ruby, You"
Three characters have become playable characters and new!
Adventure the mirror world with Chika, Ruby, and You!

2. New story "Chika, Ruby, You"
By changing the playable character, you can enjoy three new stories.

3. New initial charm "Nightwicked Chika, Nightwicked Ruby, Nightwicked You"
Each character has a dedicated initial charm.
Adventure with a cute Nightwicked charm!

4. New summoning card "Heavenly Fortune"
Yohane's summoning card "Heavenly Fortune" appears!
This appears only when the playable character is changed.
Let's play with Chika, Ruby, You and summon Yohane!

* The additional story will be the story after the main story is completed.
Please be careful if you have not cleared the main story.

* Playable characters can be selected from "Character Change" when trying to a new mirror world from the fortune -telling hall.
If you have a challenge data, you need to challenge a new mirror world from the fortune -telling hall.

* The main story does not progress during the mirror world challenge with a playable character.


* The summoning card "Heavenly Fortune" appears only when playing in "Chika, Ruby, You".
detailed_description:
Additional character pack Vol.2 "Chika & Ruby & You" includes the following:

1. Added playable character "Chika, Ruby, You"
2. New story "Chika, Ruby, You"
3. New initial charm "Nightwicked Chika, Nightwicked Ruby, Nightwicked You"
4. New summoning card "Heavenly Fortune"


I will introduce each content.

1. Added playable character "Chika, Ruby, You"
Three characters have become playable characters and new!
Adventure the mirror world with Chika, Ruby, and You!

2. New story "Chika, Ruby, You"
By changing the playable character, you can enjoy three new stories.

3. New initial charm "Nightwicked Chika, Nightwicked Ruby, Nightwicked You"
Each character has a dedicated initial charm.
Adventure with a cute Nightwicked charm!

4. New summoning card "Heavenly Fortune"
Yohane's summoning card "Heavenly Fortune" appears!
This appears only when the playable character is changed.
Let's play with Chika, Ruby, You and summon Yohane!

* The additional story will be the story after the main story is completed.
Please be careful if you have not cleared the main story.

* Playable characters can be selected from "Character Change" when trying to a new mirror world from the fortune -telling hall.
If you have a challenge data, you need to challenge a new mirror world from the fortune -telling hall.

* The main story does not progress during the mirror world challenge with a playable character.


* The summoning card "Heavenly Fortune" appears only when playing in "Chika, Ruby, You".
